meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one hundredth of a meter.
meanings.sent1: I measured the small box with a centimetre ruler.
meanings.sent2: The tailor used a centimetre tape to ensure a perfect fit.
meanings.sent3: The centimetre ruler went on strike, demanding to measure only tiny things.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was so precise, every decision was made by the centimetre.
meanings.sent5: The centimetre measurement was so exact, it left no room for error.
